marklogic.body:
A person of conviction doesn't Act based upon "feelings"...our founders didn't draft the single greatest legal document outside of the Law of God, based on "feelings"...without convictions you get Obamney and the RINO establishment. Good luck selling your soul to that. I won't.
My forefathers Bled the ground red because they didn't believe in expedience over conviction....honor and conviction are now sold to the highest bidder for the lowest possible return. Forget that noise.
I will stand with my forefathers.
